Articles.Content:
so im using MECHJEB and KAC to xfer to eeloo from kerbin but for what ever reason the node is drifting while im trying to align to it. engines are off, RCS is off it still jitters turning RCS on only makes it worse. do i need a higher orbit?

Edited October 4, 2014 by endl
Do you have SAS on? that seems to cause it sometimes. Try timewarping to x5 and making the node. That should stop any movement, and stop the movement.

ok i figured it out. KAC xfer alarm doesnt time the same xfer calculations as mechjeb so the node dances because its 1 year away. so instead of making a KAC xfer timer i had mechjeb make the node then add the node timer to KAC this makes the node much more stable and basically invalidates any usefulness of KAC xfer timer
I've noticed it does that on my stock game version.
